name: A Grape Escapes
description:
You are an average sentient grape who is a soldier for the fruit allied nations. You were sent to enemy territory for a simple reconnaissance mission. Unfortunately... it was a trap. You are now a prisoner of the Flies, a species known for devouring fruits. Their prisons are known to be convoluted and difficult to escape. As a fruit soldier, it is your mission to escape. However, the Flies will try to eat you on sight and you will be spotted. Your only option is to fight your way out!

SONGS:

RISE - Density and Time

Escape - Eveningland

Escape - Houses of Heaven

A Fever - Devon Church
